headline: Entergy Texas seeks gas generation to meet 1 GW of new demand
summary: The utility issued a request for proposals seeking gas-fired resources capable of being online by 2032 to meet “significant industrial and residential growth.”

raw.headline: Entergy Texas seeks gas generation to meet 1 GW of new demand
raw.summary: The utility issued a request for proposals seeking gas-fired resources capable of being online by 2032 to meet “significant industrial and residential growth.”

headline: Entergy Expands Equity Program With Barclays To Support Long Term Investments
summary: Entergy (NYSE:ETR) has updated its at the market equity distribution program. Barclays Capital Inc. and Barclays Bank PLC have been added as new parties to the existing Sales Agreement. The program continues to include several large financial institutions as sales agents. Entergy, a regulated utility serving power customers across several U.S. regions, relies on regular access to capital to fund grid investments, reliability projects, and regulatory commitments. By broadening the group of...
